Comment: The interview process is quite long and it will took several weeks and months before they will schedule an interview and another few weeks and months again before they will inform you about the result of the interview.
Interview Process was quick and the questions were very straightforward. The interviewers were kind and gave a lot of time for me to ask them questions as well. They explained the role well.

Exam > Tech Interview > Final Interview  Exam: 2 algo problems and 1 sql problem. Done via MS Teams you have to share your screen and solve the problems while being monitored.  Tech Interview: Interview with the team lead questions are mostly about your previous projects technical questions about the technologies you've used and some behavioral and situational.   Final Interview: Final interview is with the hiring manager from the UK. Mostly technical questions and situational.  HR peeps are very nice and accommodating keeps me regularly updated about my application.

They will text you and schedule you for an interview and send you a technical assessment and aptitude. They will call if you passed the exam and start with HR interview. If the team lead is available they will proceed with Technical Interview and then Hiring manager

Three part interview process First part consist of a typical interview where you will be presented with introspective interpersonal questions In the second part of the interview you will be asked various analytical questions very much like solving puzzles. Third part is where the technical interview comes in. I would seem like you are being gauged on you backgrounds on different technologies. particularly those written on your resume. There will also be a technical examination after the interview.

There were 3 interviews and the types of questions that they asked were related to my resume and technical skills. There was an examination that was challenging and appropriate because it was a technical exam (Algorithms and SQL) and there was no nonsense examinations like vocabulary test.
The interview process was like this: HR Interview > Exam > Technical > Final Interview It took a total of 2 weeks to close the offer.  The Job offer is sent digitally :)
